name: Deliverobo
description:
ENTER A BINARY NUMBER WHICH WILL BE TAKEN AS A DIRECTION

ENTER IT AGAIN TO ACCELERATE, OR ANOTHER NUMBER TO CHANGE DIRECTION/DECELERATE, AS IN THE PICTURE

THE NUMBER IN WORLD COORDINATES, I.E. 00 IS ALWAYS THE UPPER LEFT CORNER REGARDLESS OF THE CURRENT ROTATION OF THE ROBOT

TRY NOT TO DRIVE INTO BUILDINGS AND OBSTACLES

DRIVE TO YOUR  DESTINATIONS TO EARN POINTS BEFORE TIME RUNS OUT!

TAB TO START/PAUSE
